General.Name: Foryou Corp
General.Description: Foryou Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the automotive electronics, precision electronic components, precision die casting, and LED lighting businesses in China and internationally. It offers smart cockpit domain controller products, head-up display, and electronic exterior rearview mirror; smart driving products; and provides connected vehicle system products and services. The company offers precision electronic components; and precision die casting products, including automotive parts and components, precision 3C components, etc. In addition, it offers LED lighting products. Foryou Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.
General.Address: No.1 North Shangxia Road, Huizhou, China, 516005
